backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles and publisher records with CRUD operations and authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty serviceMeetingConductors map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing requirements, affected files, components, and test IDs for multiple frontend features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short textual summaries of their functionality.
frontend/.env: Sets the Internet Identity provider URL for authentication.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router defining authentication flow and routes including the Service Meeting Conductors page.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component containing header, sidebar, routed content, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header bar showing app title, mobile menu button, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive sidebar component rendering navigation links with active-state styling and mobile toggle behavior.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal form for creating or editing global notes with validation, publisher attachment, and API mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Card UI that displays a global note preview with category badge, attached publisher, date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Modal for adding a pioneer record by selecting an active publisher and service year, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a pioneer record, triggering a delete mutation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Modal for editing an existing pioneer, pre-filling fields and submitting updates through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal form for creating a publisher, handling validation, mutations, and form state reset.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Delet: Empty placeholder file for a dialog to delete a publisher note.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal for editing an existing publisher, preloading values and submitting updates via mutation.
Empty placeholder file for a modal to edit a publisher note.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Publi: Empty placeholder file for a UI card displaying a publisher note.
Empty placeholder file for a section listing publisher notes.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal for editing a shepherding visit, initializing fields from existing data and submitting updates after validation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal for recording a new shepherding visit, validating required fields and creating the visit via mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal for adding a task with title, due date, category, and notes, including validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal form for editing a task, preloading task data and submitting updates via useUpdateTask.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal to create a new territory with number and type validation and submit via useCreateTerritory.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Displays sorted checkout history records in a table with optional edit actions.
Modal for checking out a territory to a selected publisher, with campaign option and submission via useCheckOutTerritory.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog to delete a territory note using useDeleteTerritoryNote.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal to edit an existing checkout record, prefilled from the record and submitted via useUpdateCheckoutRecord.
Modal form for editing a territory's number and type, with validation and update mutation.
Modal for editing an existing territory note, saving updates through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Displays a single territory note with its date and edit/delete buttons.
Manages creating, listing, sorting, editing, and deleting notes for a territory.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on authentication, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook to add a publisher, mapping UI privilege selections to backend format and refreshing publisher data.
Mutation hook for checking out a territory to a publisher and refreshing relevant territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook for creating a global note with validation and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePioneer.ts: Mutation hook for creating a pioneer and invalidating the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateShepherdingV: Mutation hook for creating a shepherding visit and refreshing visit data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Mutation hook for creating a task with structured input and invalidating task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Creates a new territory with a generated ID and invalidates the territories list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook to delete a global note and refresh global note queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePioneer.ts: Mutation hook to delete a pioneer and refresh the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Provides a mutation to delete a publisher with optimistic cache updates and error rollback.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Creates a mutation to delete a task and invalidate all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Defines queries to fetch all global notes or a single note by ID via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider and hook for login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneers.ts: Provides a query to fetch all pioneers from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains queries for fetching all publishers or a single publisher by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceMeetingCond: Exposes a query to load all service meeting conductor assignments.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Implements queries and mutations for fetching, updating, and deleting single shepherding visits.
Provides a query to fetch all shepherding visits.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Contains queries for tasks filtered by status and for fetching a single task by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritories.ts: Provides a query to fetch all territories.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Defines queries and mutations for fetching, updating, deleting, and changing availability of a single territory.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Implements queries and mutations for CRUD operations on territory notes tied to a territory ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Provides a mutation to update a territory checkout record and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Creates a mutation to update a global note and refresh global notes cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Defines a mutation to update a pioneer and invalidate the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Provides a mutation hook to update a publisher and invalidate the publishers list. Maps UI privilege options to backend privilege flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Defines a mutation hook for updating tasks and invalidating all task queries. Calls the backend actorâ€™s updateTask method.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Mutation hook to toggle task completion status and refresh task data. Wraps actor.updateTaskCompletion.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables including theme colors and Theiarco-specific utilities. Adds light and dark mode color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Renders the root App component and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Simple placeholder page showing a coming soon message with icon and title. Used for unfinished features.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity authentication with styled UI elements. Displays a login button and app branding.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Notes management page with filtering, sorting, adding, editing, and deleting global notes. Uses multiple hooks and dialogs to manage note interactions.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Lists pioneers with add, edit, and delete functionality through modals and dialogs. Loads pioneer and publisher data and shows a sortable table.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single publisher with edit and delete actions. Fetches publisher data, shows badges, and handles navigation and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Manages listing, filtering, adding, editing, and deleting publishers with modals and search/group filters.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceMeetingConduct: Displays assigned service meeting conductors with loading and empty states and a placeholder for assignment actions.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Shows, filters, sorts, records, edits, and deletes shepherding visits with modals and search filtering.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays a single shepherding visit profile with note editing, visit editing, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Lists tasks with filtering, completion toggling, and modals for adding, editing, and deleting tasks.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Shows territories with status coloring, checkout duration logic, highlighting overdue checkouts, and a modal for adding new territories.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Territory detail page handling territory fetch, edit, delete, checkout actions, and rendering notes and history components.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions that convert backend bigint timestamps (nanoseconds or seconds) into formatted date strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing planned and existing features for the Service Meeting Conductors functionality and backend domain.
